templates.title: Pi-hole
templates.description: A network-wide ad blocker DNS sinkhole that protects your devices from unwanted content.
templates.name: compose-pi-hole

env.name: WEB_PASSWORD
env.label: Web password
env.description: Set a secure password for web.

templates.title: Heimdall Application Dashboard
templates.description: Heimdall Application Dashboard is a dashboard for all your web applications. It doesn't need to be limited to applications though, you can add links to anything you like.
templates.name: compose-heimdall

env.name: HTTP_PORT
env.label: HTTP port (optional)
env.description: HTTP web port for Heimdall Application Dashboard.

env.name: HTTPS_PORT
env.label: HTTPS port (optional)
env.description: HTTPS web port for Heimdall Application Dashboard.

templates.notice: Ensure to enter different numbers for HTTP port and HTTPS port.

templates.title: Redis
templates.description: A minimal Docker image based on Alpine Linux with a complete package index and only 5 MB in size!
templates.name: docker-alpine
